title: Iodine/DMSO-catalyzed oxidative deprotection of N-tosylhydrazone for benzoic acid synthesis
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,30482-30486
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA05849F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 3.0 Unported Licence.
Rakshanda Singhal, Manish K. Mehra, Babita Malik, Meenakshi Pilania
An oxidative deprotection approach has been developed using iodine-DMSO system to synthesize carboxylic acid derivatives from N-tosylhydraones, yielding good to excellent results.
